DHENKANAL: Tata Steel has deployed four female employees as stacker-cum-reclaimer (SCR) operators for the first time at its Meramandali plant in Odisha's Dhenkanal district.

articles.title: Centre's "More Intensive Than Usual Checks" On New Air India CEO: Report - NDTV
articles.description: The Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh is calling on the government to block the appointment of Ilker Ayci as chief executive of Air India, citing his previous political links in Turkey, with which New Delhi has strained relations.
articles.content:
New Air India CEO Ayci was the former chairman of Turkish Airlines. (FILE)

articles.title: Indian Oil Refiners Are Snapping Up Cheap Russian Crude - BloombergQuint
articles.description: Indian refiners are loading up on Russian oil as prices of the nation’s crude plunge to unprecedented lows.
articles.content:
